reviews.review_text: We decided for lunch at Bonita and was greatly impressed! The atmosphere was lovely, the food was delicious, and the service was top-notch. Trisha, our server, was absolutely fantastic - friendly, attentive, and extremely professional. She made sure our glasses were always full and our plates were never empty. Her recommendations were spot on, and she even took the time to answer all our questions about the menu. The entire experience was seamless and enjoyable, thanks to Trisha's exceptional service. Highly recommend for a fantastic afternoon dining experience! 5/5 stars!"

Lovely place!
Parking has a valet service.
The Pizzas were unique, especially the Butter garlic Prawns pizza.
We loved the Lamb burgers and the Mushroom soup was divine.
Their mocktails are also beautifully presented.
It's more of European cuisine with some Indian infusions.
Service was quick & very comforting.
Everyone has so many smiles here.
The ambience is simply beautiful & so curated. Decor was bohemian and mostly white. There was live music in the evenings as well.
Beautiful grounds for some lovely group family snaps.
This place is Perfect for a special family moment.

The food was exquisite and authentic. Quite fresh and flavourful. The service by Trisha and Sid was top notch. The vibe of the place is refreshing. I’d highly recommend it if you’re a person keen on having a cozy lunch surrounded by lush green grass on a warm afternoon.
